about_the_game:
NOTICE:
Please run the game in your Library, or the achievements may not be unlockedヽ(；▽；)ノ
And please don't press F12 to take a screenshot. It will bring the game back to tile.

◇ Trick & Treat Remake and Art Book Vol.2 is now available on Steam! ◇


A young witch named Charlotte and her maid Amelia went trick or treating on the Halloween Eve, and somehow they decided to visit a cursed mansion.
Before Amelia could figure out anything, she was on her own in this huge, ominous house. Dance with the ghosts, play with the dolls, and hopefully, she can uncover the dark past of the house and see Miss Charlotte again.

You'll play as Amelia the Pumpkin Maid. It's about exploring and solving puzzles in a spooky atmosphere. There will be some horror elements, romance, many deaths (bad ends) and a happy ending of true love.

- Warning -
It contains blood, death, jumpscares, and ghost/monsters.


  • A light-hearted Halloween adventure. The puzzles are not hard, either.
  • About 90 minutes gameplay.
  • Original spirites and CGs.
  • Multiple ends and 9 dead ends.
  • A hidden room (Extra) will be available after the Normal or True end.
  • A new outfit for Amelia will be available for the second run :D
  • Steam Achievements


Original music in the trailer: "Halloween" by Zephysonas
Special Thanks: SophiaSW, Duelist

name: Trick & Treat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/ Vista/7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Trick or treating in a vampire's house.Trick & Treat is a light-hearted Halloween adventure. It's about exploring and solving puzzles in a spooky atmosphere. There will be some horror elements, romance, many bad ends and a happy ending of true love.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
